build.buildCommand: npm install && npm run build && cp fallback-server.js dist/ || echo 'Ensuring fallback server is available'

deploy.startCommand: node -e "try { require('./dist/index.js') } catch(e) { console.error('Error loading main server:', e); try { require('./dist/fallback.js') } catch(e2) { console.error('Error loading fallback server:', e2); require('./fallback-server.js') } }"
